Articles.Content:
This is 29th of april. a YEAR after i created my account, so much emotions (no), first of all, i want to thank the amazing community of the forum, it's helped me with things i did or didn't know. Second the Mods, i always thought about mods as annoying, but this forum moderators are perfect, Friendly and community speaking.

Biggest thanks to Squad team and TakeTwo interactive, for supporting KSP.

 

sorry if they are mistakes, im on mobile.

Edited April 29, 2019 by JERONIMO

Good for you! 

Mine’s tomorrow...

Edited April 30, 2019 by Fraston
